transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello, haan ji. Haan ji, haan ji sir, aapki discussion chal raha tha na, main IndiaMART se baat kar raha hoon.

Customer: Theek hai, ek second main baat karwata hoon.

Executive: Hello.

Executive: Hello, haan ji sir, abhi discussion chal raha tha na, IndiaMART se baat kar raha hoon.

Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.

Executive: Aap ek baar ke liye please panel open karenge to setting tab mein jaiye.

Customer: Setting tab mein.

Executive: Haan.

Customer: Haan ji, setting tab mein chale gaye sir.

Executive: Upar mein dekhiye notification setting ke right mein likha hoga account setting karke.

Customer: Haan, account setting karke likha hai, bilkul theek hai.

Executive: Usme sabse upar mein likha hoga create IndiaMART lead manager with the third party CRM karke aur waha pe likha hoga CRM ki generated page with this tool.

Customer: Haan, haan, dikh gaya.

Executive: And please visit the following link to generate or view the CRM key to integrate.

Customer: Haan ji, haan ji. Uske neeche hai blue colour mein, ispe click kar doon?

Executive: Ji sir, uspe click karke aap next kariye.

Customer: Haan ji, haan ji, generate ki na ji?

Customer: Name of the CRM you are using, haan ji?

Executive: Aapke paas jo CRM hai na sir, uski details bhi aapko yaha se fill up karni padegi. Aur sara kuch done karne ke baad submit karenge to yaha se automatic wo aapka waha se link ho jayega aur data ko aap pull aur push kar sakte hain yaha se IndiaMART.

Customer: Ah, ye dalna pad raha hai.

Executive: Main line pe hi hoon, aap process kariye.

Customer: Ji sir, aa gaya to isko copy kar lena ya ye aise hi rahega ab?

Executive: Sir copy, nahi ye to waise to aise hi rahega lekin fir bhi aap isko note down karke rakh lijiye, copy karke save karke rakh lijiyega aise.

Customer: Haan, main wahi keh raha hoon, isko copy kar lete hain, better hai. Jaise wo Trade India ka to waise hi pada rehta hai na?

Executive: Haan, nahi waise to yaha pe bhi aise hi save hi rahega lekin fir bhi sir.

Customer: Haan, bilkul, bilkul, main tabhi kahun usko copy karne ke liye bol raha hoon. Isko save hi kar lete hain, name de dete hain isko key.

Customer: Haan ji, ye ho gaya sir mera na. Ab iska user ID, profile ID wagera to nahi hota kuch alag se?

Executive: Nahi, aisa kuch nahi hota. IndiaMART se agar ye key generate hua, matlab IndiaMART ke application se integrate karne ka to yaha se auto system mein alag se kuch bhi wo uska user ID aur password create nahi hota.

Customer: Theek hai, theek hai. Matlab ye hamara kaam ho gaya. Matlab aapki taraf se kaam khatam ho gaya ab?

Executive: Ji, ji, ji, ji.

Customer: Theek, theek. Okay, thank you.

Executive: Hai na? Dusri cheez sir, yaha se main dekh raha hoon ki apan log na abhi jo plan chala rahe hain wo TrustSeal ka service ka chala rahe hain, RFID digital solar ka. Iska kaisa response aa raha hai apne ko?

Customer: Sir, iska na response jo hai wo kya kehte hain, theek thak hai. Matlab hum agar plan udana chah rahe hain to lekin us hisab se cheeze aa nahi rahi hain.

Customer: Aur hamare paas to kitna hota hai ki matlab we are the biggest importer in India solar lights ke liye.

Executive: Okay.

Customer: Haan. Lekin agar aapne market mein competition dekha hoga na, kyuki aapki company mein bahut badi level ki dekh raha hoon yaha pe. Lekin us tarike se mere portal pe visible nahi kyuki jaise ki aapko Punjab se baat karu, ye solar LED ke andar lights ki bhi baat kare, aap khud ek baar please Google pe jaake aap apna product ko search karke dekhiyega aur specific aap Chandigarh ho gaya, jaha jaha pe aap kaam karte ho, us location ko apply karke aap check kariega ki samne wala jab meri company ko product ko search kar raha hai to IndiaMART portal pe wo kaha pe dekh pa raha hai isme.

Customer: Hmm. Yaha pe maximum jo bhi suppliers hai jo Punjab mein kaam kar rahe hain wo kare meri SEO ki meri meri in house hi SEO team usne abhi just pichle ek mahine mein kaam start kiya hai.

Customer: To for Feb tak mere ko lagta hai kahin hum kafi upar aa jayenge.

Executive: Okay. SEO hai na wo parallel mera kaam chal raha hai.

Executive: Okay, website wala jo aap bole na like Google pe agar koi search kara to.

Customer: Haan, Google pe agar koi search karega to mera upar aa jayega. SEO pe mera kaam chal hi raha hai, meri add bhi chalti hai even all over India.

Executive: Okay. Haan, future kaafi kaafi bada investment kiya hoga Kumar sahab aapke SEO karwane mein kareeb 50 se 60000 kareeb aisa monthly basis pe aapka maybe investment jayega agar aap sari category pe promotion le rahe hain to.

Customer: Haan, bilkul sir, bilkul aa jata hai. Main wahi keh raha hoon ki hame wo cheeze IndiaMART ki taraf se kyuki IndiaMART ek achcha platform mana jata hai jitna meri knowledge mein jitni meri knowledge mein hai jitna mera che mahine ka mera jitna maine study ki hai cheeze platforms mein na. Us hisab se cheeze jo hai na wo aa nahi pa rahi hain.

Customer: Mere se bhi socha ki kam se kam hafte mein ek lead aani chahiye, hum jyada expect bhi nahi karte hain. Hum chahte hain mahine mein teen se char leads hamari finalize ho jaye, hame jyada nahi chahiye.

Executive: Sir, aap market mein itne time se kaam karte hain, aapko bhi pata hai ki jo cheeze front pe hoti hai na waha pe inquiry count jyada jata hai. Ab aapke market mein competition itna ki specific mere paas Punjab se kareeb kareeb 100 se 150 suppliers honge sir. Ab waha pe agar main aapki company ko 30 40 number tak.

Customer: Sir, usme se usme se 50% to mere se hi le rahe honge.

Executive: Ye apne ko feedback isliye aata hai na kyuki haan bilkul sahi baat hai kyuki log online visibility ke liye lete hain sir. Bahut sare suppliers na online visibility ke liye portal pe rehte hain to bahut sare suppliers.

Customer: Main wahi keh raha hoon na ki aate 50% to mere se hi le rahe honge usme se.

Executive: Ji, ji, ji. To lekin hum log to as a market mein business karne ke liye aaye hain sir. To kuch aapne API bhi generate kara diya hai data ko idhar se udhar karne ke liye to aap kuch thoda sa premium plan kariye start supplier plus ka sir. To waha pe data count aapka jyada hoga, API aapke paas hai, data filtration karke hum kaafi achcha kaam kar sakte hain waha pe.

Customer: Chalo isiliye maine ye liya hai ki yaar ye CRM ek tally CRM hai ye main kaha check to kare kya hai kya nahi hai. Abhi performance ab check karenge na hum actual performance. Abhi tak to cheeze samajh nahi aa rahi thi ki humne actual Trade India bhi le rakha hai, Just Dial bhi le rakha hai.

Customer: To haan to us point of view se ki

Executive: Bilkul aapko samajh nahi aa rahi thi.

Customer: Samajh nahi aa rahi thi kis se kya kaha pe kya cheeze aa rahi hain.

Executive: Bilkul, bilkul ki Trade India se kitna aa raha hai, IndiaMART se kitna aa raha hai, investment kitna hai uske against mein ROI kitna nikal ke aa raha hai wo sari cheeze.

Customer: Bilkul, bilkul aur kaun sa agent better perform kar raha hai, kaun sa nahi kar raha hai wo sari cheeze mere ko us platform pe dikh jayengi ab.

Executive: Aap ek baar ke liye sir observe kariega lekin ek cheez isme rakhiye kyuki aapka investment kaha pe kitna aur uske against mein return kitna aa raha hai. Maan lo agar aapne Trade India mein jyada paise diye sir aur waha se agar return jyada aa raha hai to wo cheez alag ho jayegi lekin aap investment mein aap check kariye.

Customer: Bilkul, sir isiliye isiliye liya hai maine ye isiliye liya hai maine ki jaha se mere ko kam aayega wo fir main out kar dunga na us platform ko mere ko jarurat nahi hai fir uski next year se.

Executive: Bilkul, bilkul. Ji, ji, ji. Haan, theek hai.

Executive: Baki koi issue rehta hai to aap directly Rahul ji ke sath connect back kar lijiyega aur aapke paas ek feedback mail aayega ki jo aapne humne aapko support kiya isko API ko link karwane ke liye to please aap positive feedback dijiyega humen.

Customer: Theek hai sir, theek hai.

Executive: Thank you sir. Thank you. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know about TrustSeal service response.

- Expects more leads from IndiaMART platform.



Resolution:

- Executive assisted with CRM integration process.

- Executive explained about online visibility importance.

- Suggested premium plan for better data filtration.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will observe platform performance.

- Customer will provide feedback on API linking support.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- crm integration, trustseal, leads, seo, visibility
